locations.name: Foyer
locations.description:
You stand in the entry foyer of the mansion,
 You hear a faint whisper of 'It puts the lotion on it's skin or else it gets the hose again' 
 As you look around, you see a ghost... should you talk to it, or do you think you can fight it?

locations.name: Hallway 1E
locations.description:
You stand in a long hallway that continues to the West. 
To the north you see another hallway with several other rooms. 
To the East is a closed door.

locations.name: Hallway 1W
locations.description:
You stand to the west of the initial hallway you walked in. 
You see doors to the North and South

locations.name: Coat Closet
locations.description: You see a rack of coats and one very nice looking leather jacket

locations.name: Butler's Room
locations.description: A small room where the butler used to rest

locations.name: Secret Room
locations.description: A hidden room, maybe there's something good in here

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description:
A spacious kitchen with various cooking tools,
It's obvious whoever owns this house is not the one that uses this room

locations.name: Dining Room
locations.description: A grand dining room with an elegant table

locations.name: Hallway 2S
locations.description:
A long hallway connecting different rooms.
You see doors to the East and West, and the hallway continuing North. 
South will lead you back to the entry hall

locations.name: Hallway 2N
locations.description:
A long hallway connecting different rooms. 
You see doors to the East and West, another hallway North, and South the hallway continues

locations.name: Ballroom
locations.description: An extravagant ballroom with a shiny chandelier

locations.name: Storage Room
locations.description: A room filled with old and unused items

locations.name: Home Office
locations.description: A study room with a large desk and bookshelves

locations.name: Hallway 3E
locations.description:
To the North you see a door.
The hallway continues West, and South will take you to back towards the entrance

locations.name: Hallway 3W
locations.description:
You see doors to the North, West and South, 
and the hallway continuing East

locations.name: Bedroom
locations.description:
A cozy bedroom with a comfortable bed. 
you see what looks like a diary on the desk

locations.name: Master Bedroom
locations.description:
The master bedroom of the house. 
You see a grotesque figure slowly walking towards you

locations.name: Bathroom
locations.description: A well-maintained bathroom with modern amenities

locations.name: Library
locations.description: A room filled with shelves of books and ancient knowledge

characters.name: zombie
characters.description: Exactly what you'd expect an undead monster would look like... Beautiful!
dialog: Ummm good Sir, would you mind handing over your brain?

characters.name: ghost
dialog: Please don't hurt me, I'm not one of the bad ones
I can tell you're new here, by the fact you're still....you know.... breathing
Please, don't go in, there's things here you don't want to see

items.name: knife
items.description: Sharp looking chef's knife (You're in the kitchen, what do you expect

items.name: chain bat
items.description: The most epic looking bat you've seen so far tonight.  It has a heavy chain wrapped around the receiving end.

items.name: leather jacket
items.description: Brown leather jacket that obviously cost someone a pretty penny

items.name: grimoire
items.description: A book with a dark an ominous presence about it
